channel.title: How do you imagine your death?
channel.description:
Okay, so imagine your life is a movie. And it's going to end. What you think you would feel in that moment? I'm not talking about the way you think you'll die, but how it will feel.
For me, I would calmly lay on the floor, then my eyes would shut, but I would still be able to see. My soul would then leave my body behind, and it would start floating, rising to the skies. I would watch the faces of the people that was important for me(not only good, bad people too), and Unchained melody would start to play. Then I would reach the clouds, and go through them. Finally, the sky would turn black as the music fades, and one shooting star would blink, before everything ends.

item.title: How do you imagine your death?
item.dc:creator: Eric_Fong
item.description:
Since it is kinda half alive and half dead, why not?

I’d hope to die like a Knight covered in many arrows, impaled by many blade and spear. While standing on a field full of corpses of my enemies that deserve their death. And I just kneel down and dies that way.

Realistically I’d die old or get hit by car or get heart attack.

Read full topic

item.title: How do you imagine your death?
item.dc:creator: JeffMOD
item.description:
Hopefully in bed of old age, but likely either in a transit accident of some kind or from a hail of bullets from government agents, depending on how long the current right-wing party stays in power and keeps trying to pass laws that make the country get closer and closer to a fascist surveillance state.

item.title: How do you imagine your death?
item.dc:creator: Gordon_Tiecollaronde
item.description:
Okay, to be realistic, I’d most likely die by getting shot while I try to be a hero and defend my family. I’d get hit right in the gut and go down in slow-motion while Hitman: Blood Money’s main title theme plays in the background (0:00 to 0: 35 on most of the YouTube versions of it).

Ibanez:

well okay i guess that’s fine, i thought you were just being a smartass on the internet. i didn’t know you were asking for real. i’m sorry too :3

No problem haha

Read full topic
item.source: How do you imagine your death?

item.title: How do you imagine your death?
item.dc:creator: bur
item.description:
Ibanez:

some time ago, i had a horrifyingly realistic sensation of being in a car/plane crash play in my head, complete with the utter awareness of my body being crushed into pulp. ever since then, i haven’t been able to get that feeling out of my head, and i’m utterly terrified of it actually happening, but i still drive a god damn lot anyways. i wasn’t even on any drugs, this was a completely sober experience that came out of nowhere.

it was another version of you dying in a car/plane crash in a different version of reality
you only closely escaped the set of circumstances that would have led to your death
rejoice!

Read full topic
item.source: How do you imagine your death?

item.title: How do you imagine your death?
item.dc:creator: Shaddy
item.description:
I’m assuming that I’ll either have a terminal disease, or…no, I think that’s the only way, other than some freak accident. I’ve got to good a life to have a reason to commit suicide, and I don’t ever plan on entering the military, and I sure as hell don’t want to give anyone outside the internet reasons to murder me.

Read full topic
